items.question: What should attorneys wear?
items.answer: Professional attire works best - suits, ties, or formal business wear. Dark colors photograph particularly well for legal professionals.

items.question: Are AI headshots professional enough for law firms?
items.answer: Yes. Our photos are indistinguishable from traditional photography and meet the professional standards expected in legal marketing.

items.question: Can we maintain different looks for partners vs associates?
items.answer: Yes. You can create multiple style presets for different levels within your firm while maintaining overall brand consistency.

items.question: How do we handle attorneys in multiple offices?
items.answer: Remote attorneys simply receive an invite link and can submit their selfie from any location.

items.question: Do you offer firm-wide pricing?
items.answer: Yes. We offer volume discounts for firms with 25+ attorneys. Contact us for enterprise pricing.
